name: Drakewarden
description: Drakewardens forge bonds with draconic spirits, fighting alongside a growing drake companion.

3.name: Drake Companion
3.description: You summon a drake that grows in power as you gain levels.

7.name: Bond of Fang and Scale
7.description: You and your drake gain elemental resistance and enhanced attacks.

15.name: Perfected Bond
15.description: Your drake gains flight and stronger attacks.
